like)(
PHENOMENAL GAME AND MOST OF ALL GOD TIER VOICE ACTING.  100/10

about 7 hours long, and really fun. i brought it simply because it was on sale; and yet its still a timeless classic that i really enjoy. this is only the 2nd time ive truly played through it and its about a 7 hour game (2 hour if you're a speedrunner) but its a blast through and through, and genuinely worth the FULL price. almost a decade and this is still one of the best singleplayer and co op games out there, valve hit gold with this one and didnt even sell out. i'd love to see more of GLADos and Wheatley, they play off each other soo well. the story is super well written in both the plot and the characters themselves. alot of great jokes and funny moments, like wheatley calling you a "fatty fatty no parents" because you're an orphan. i cant wait for a couple years so i can play through this again.
AAAA

10 years late to the game, but I could not resist playing this magnificent game. Needless to say, you should too. Fantastic puzzles for all ages, hilarious comedy, and wonderful sense of impending doom.
Great game! The uniqueness of the levels and the puzzle solving really makes you engaged. Learning all the strategies and paths will make you say "OHHHHHH I SEE" 8.5/10 game most definitely!

最早是为联机购买的，是一款很优秀的游戏，优化与音效都做得很好，很推荐这款游戏！

TLDR: Very creative sequel and a great one at that
So i dont have a very good description on how good this game is, it has a good story and way more gameplay than the first portal game but it has so much to say about, from the overgrowth in the original stages to the new ways for movement (repulsion, propulsion, and portal surface gels), having a new character and much more. the end scene (along with the space scene) are very unique and remember the companion cube from the first game? you end up getting it back at the wheat field scene

10/10 reunite with companion cube

Portal 2 aslında dönemine göre çok iyi bir oyun bana göre.Arkadaşınla girip kafa yorucağınız 2 3 saat girerseniz kafa yapabilecek :D güzel bir oyun internetten çözümüne bakmak iyi birşey değil ama yapamadığınız zaman bakmanız lazım ben mesela 1 saat bakmıştım yapamayınca baktım çünkü oyunu silesim gelmişti.Temel olarak dönemine göre çok iyi bir oyun ve şuanda harcayacağınız en iyi 3.70 tldir.(Hikaye portal 1 le bağlantılı)
Oyun çok güzel sadece bazen aşırı beyin yakıyor ama sarıyor devam devam...
